title: Smart LED TV
short_description: Enjoy a smart viewing experience with this LED TV.
detailed_description: This Smart LED TV offers stunning picture quality and a range of smart features for an immersive entertainment experience.

title: 4K Ultra HD TV
short_description: Experience lifelike visuals with this 4K Ultra HD TV.
detailed_description: This 4K Ultra HD TV delivers stunning clarity and exceptional color reproduction for a cinematic viewing experience at home.

title: OLED Curved TV
short_description: Immerse yourself in the beauty of this OLED Curved TV.
detailed_description: This OLED Curved TV provides an extraordinary visual experience with its curved display and stunning OLED technology.

title: French Door Fridge
short_description: Keep your food fresh with this spacious French Door Fridge.
detailed_description: This French Door Fridge offers ample storage space and advanced cooling technology to preserve your groceries for longer.

title: Side-by-Side Fridge
short_description: Organize your groceries easily with this convenient Side-by-Side Fridge.
detailed_description: This Side-by-Side Fridge offers a spacious layout and convenient access to both the fridge and freezer compartments.

title: Mini Fridge
short_description: Compact and portable, this Mini Fridge is perfect for small spaces.
detailed_description: This Mini Fridge is energy-efficient and ideal for dorm rooms, offices, or small apartments.

title: Countertop Microwave
short_description: Efficient and compact, this Countertop Microwave fits any kitchen.
detailed_description: This Countertop Microwave offers various cooking options and a space-saving design, making it perfect for small kitchens or dorm rooms.

title: Over-the-Range Microwave
short_description: Convenient and powerful, this Over-the-Range Microwave streamlines your kitchen.
detailed_description: This Over-the-Range Microwave comes with advanced features and provides additional counter space by mounting it above your stove.

title: Convection Microwave
short_description: Enjoy versatile cooking with this Convection Microwave.
detailed_description: This Convection Microwave combines microwave and convection oven functionality, allowing you to bake, roast, and microwave food with ease.

title: Front-load Washing Machine
short_description: Efficient and gentle on clothes, this Front-load Washing Machine gets the job done.
detailed_description: This Front-load Washing Machine offers advanced washing features and a spacious drum to handle large loads with care.

title: Top-load Washing Machine
short_description: Convenient and reliable, this Top-load Washing Machine makes laundry a breeze.
detailed_description: This Top-load Washing Machine features multiple wash programs and a user-friendly design for easy operation.

title: Electric Dryer
short_description: Efficiently dry your clothes with this Electric Dryer.
detailed_description: This Electric Dryer offers multiple drying settings and a large drum capacity to handle your laundry needs.
